website_summaries.verdict: Versatile filled grappling dummy that's specifically sized for use by youngsters.
pros: Positioning and shape of this dummy work well for takedowns, throws, and strikes during practice sessions
Ships filled, so it's ready to use as soon as you receive it
Measures 5 feet high and weighs 50 pounds, which is great for youth
cons: Filled design means it costs more than an unfilled dummy

customer_reviews.title: Moldy gross piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing showed up all moldy. I bought it for my son, I wouldn’t even let him use it, it’s f-ing gross. I read some reviews on here before I bought it that mentioned the mold issue. I figured the company would of taken care of them by the time I bought it. Guess not, I sent it back and bought one from suples called speed dummy instead. It didn’t show up moldy and seems to be a better product. These combat sports guys are a joke.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Seems appropriate height weight for 9 yr old big boy ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems appropriate height weight for 9 yr old big boy. 5ft tall 50 lbs. negatively it’s not placed in a bag inside the box. Scuff marks on material and Lots of mold spots all over dummy, will try and clean and leave another review afterwards............ Update spots did not come off and only turned random colors. Chest unstitching and arm stitching came out and required tape. Not lasting and has had very little use. Unhappy
customer_reviews.author: joshua lewis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely for teenagers and adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is in youth wrestling and doesn't match up too many people at practice. Due to it being stiff and hard to perform moves on due to its stability as a standing wrestling dummy doesn't work as well as it probably should
customer_reviews.author: Dustin stegall

customer_reviews.title: It does not bend as much as we would have liked. However
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 5 yr old son to help him with wrestling. It does not bend as much as we would have liked. However, it does serve its purpose for the practice of double leg take downs and dump truck movement to roll his opponent off of him. Would be best for kick boxing rather than wrestling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to add to the wrestling room
customer_reviews.text: Came way faster then originally said which was awesome. My 7 year old son throws this and practices with it non stop. Quality seems to be great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was not new not even close was used and scuffed everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: the kids love to beat on this and it works great for ...
customer_reviews.text: the kids love to beat on this and it works great for take down training for wrestling. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Star Deserved
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old comes home and practices on this dummy. It has helped with refining skill and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable !
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied. I bought this product for our youth wrestling club and the "reinforced stitching " completely fell apart around the waist , splitting the dummy completely in half, four months after purchase. When I contacted the company to inquire about any warranty, I was told it was covered only for 30 days. This is a grappling dummy!!!!! Stand by the integrity ( or lack there of) of your products!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason R.

customer_reviews.title: Wrestling.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 7 year old who is 51 lbs. Great for level change shot drills!
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Received the product yesterday. Seems well built but time ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the product yesterday. Seems well built but time will tell. I am a little upset because it list 50lbs on the actual dummy but weight is well over 70 lbs. I am trying to contact the company but can't find a number. Exactly what I was looking for but not the size I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Kids loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Kida are into wrestling and this lets them wrestle this instead of each other.
customer_reviews.author: randalwalker

customer_reviews.title: TOO BIG
customer_reviews.text: TALLER AND HEAVIER THAN ADVERTISED ITS 5 FT TALL AND 70-80 LB
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for bjj and mma, not so much for wrestling.
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and seems pretty solid. My son hasn't used it as much as I thought he would. I thought he could use it for wrestling, but the dummy is pretty stiff and is hard to perform some of the common wrestling moves. Good for ground and pound and armbars though.
customer_reviews.author: Christian C

customer_reviews.title: weak stiching
customer_reviews.text: Got this item 3 days ago. stiching along waistline is comming undone aready.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with how this item was shipped to me. Gross.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed at the way this item was shipped to me. Opened the box to find it disgustingly dirty. It looks like it was used outside in the dirt. Sad when you paid a lot of money for it. It should come perfect seeing as it is supposed to be new. Absolutely disgusted. It’s a Christmas present for my son so tomorrow I will try to scrub it clean before I decide if I have to send it back and he will be without it for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it because you can wrestle it
customer_reviews.text: I like it because you can wrestle it. I don't like that it is heavy. i like it because it is strong. -Reviewed by 7 year old boy
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Wrestling Buddy
customer_reviews.text: My kid is big into WWF and of course he is a wrestler. This is the perfect weight as he can't quite throw it against my walls or down the stairs as he has with previous toys. He is a 1st grader and can lift it to toss a few steps away from him, so it is perfect. It is flexible enough to practice some of his wrestling moves and provides resistance.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: maybe for 12 years old good quality, I would buy it
customer_reviews.text: to big , maybe for 12 years old good quality, I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: thetrooper

customer_reviews.title: 12 yr old was ALL smiles at Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: Had a 'slight' odor when it arrived, but that soon dissipated after the 'bag' was removed. My 12 yr old is 5'2", about 105-110 lb and very athletic. He's active in football, basketball, and baseball throughout the year, but loves wrestling and grappling sports... He works out lifting this 'sparring partner' over his head and slamming to the pad, or sometimes, if the weather is nice enough, he'll go outside on the trampoline with the dummy. I did *NOT* get a discount on this product to lie to you about our impression of the product. We did pay full price, and we're glad we bought this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gd product
customer_reviews.text: Just like the view said came faster then I thought....was nasty stuff on it. Tho i whiped it with disinfectant. Gd to go. My boys loved it for XMan gift already filled 35pds
customer_reviews.author: Jaizhybre

product_meta.title: Combat Sports Youth Grappling Dummy
feature_bullets: This youth grappling dummy is the ultimate training partner for MMA, wrestling, Jiu Jitsu and submission practice
Use this contact sport dummy and go full out with your training sessions without the risk of injuring your training partner
This life size dummy is perfect for take downs, throws, submissions and strikes
Made of durable and easy to clean nylon construction
Available in both 35 or 50 pound weights for your home or commercial gym needs
